name: Idle King - Clicker Tycoon
description:
Manage your own little idle kingdom to become the king of the world and to rescue the princess.

Harvest, earn gold and get rich. Earn idle cash if you are not in the app.
Then invest in your army to fight epic battles against your enemies.
Win the war to enlarge your kingdom to save the princess who is held captive in the dark forest.
Unlock epic knights and conquer new countries to become king of the world

FEATURES
• Manage your own little kingdom
• Win gold, even when you don´t play
• Boost your income
• Unlock new ressources
• Collect epic knights
• Conquer new kingdoms
• No internet connection needed
